name: F.F.S - Fighty Fight Stickmen
description:
How To Play: Use the arrow keys to input the correct arrow sequence.
Avoid getting hit by enemies, it lowers your score
Try finishing the inputs when standing still, that way you can attack and kill your oponents for extra score.

CONTROLS:
Move with WASD
Jump with Spacebar
Use the arrow keys to input the correct arrow sequence.

Credits: 

Programming: Tomás Guerrero

Director & Audio Assets: Lukas Acosta

Graphic Assets: Axel Castillo
